ygData.subject: Re: LJ and the quest for crook staff
ygData.msgSnippet: I think I need to explain I was talking about the glowing crook staff. ... goto www.everquest.com
ygData.messageBody:
I think I need to explain I was talking about the glowing crook staff.

At 09:07 PM 7/16/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
>This druid only crook (Hierophant's Crook) is awesome. Can anyone tell us
>which NPC in SolB carries it? And what level they are, and anything else
>helpful to attaining it.
>
>
